channel.title: Possible mercenary bug
channel.description: #### What happened? Found a possible bug while playing as merc..So , my first contract died n1.. I got another one d2...Next night my second contract died as well...I got the message saying I will commit suicide , but then my second contract got revived by the priest...For some reason I was still alive , but my second contract didnt appeared as a contract anymore....Contract managed to live untill the end of the game , but I still didnt won. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have commited suicide when my second contract died #### Steps to reproduce: #### Comments: Uploaded the log as well..output_log.txt (95.5 KB)

item.title: Possible mercenary bug
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
Maybe it’s just an odd series of events.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible mercenary bug
item.dc:creator: crisselis
item.description:
What happened?

Found a possible bug while playing as merc…So , my first contract died n1… I got another one d2…Next night my second contract died as well…I got the message saying I will commit suicide , but then my second contract got revived by the priest…For some reason I was still alive , but my second contract didnt appeared as a contract anymore…Contract managed to live untill the end of the game , but I still didnt won.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should have commited suicide when my second contract died

Steps to reproduce:

Comments:

Uploaded the log as well…output_log.txt (95.5 KB)

Read full topic
